txt.en:
'A great threat rises to the north, [placeholder]....

'What I have heard of the forces in Tarlang's Crown has grown more and more unbelievable with each account. This much remains clear... we cannot allow the Corsairs or their leader in the Crown, Azruthor, to gain any more of a foothold in our lands.

'Once you have readied yourself and your allies, travel to Tarlang's Crown and find Harnion. He is a scout of mine and can guide you and your allies through our plans. I would prefer you keep this a quiet matter, for I do not wish to frighten the people.'
Talk to Harnion in Tarlang's Crown
Elaglar of Dol Amroth fears that the Corsair forces under Azruthor's rule in Tarlang's Crown will soon grow beyond control.
'Keep your voice down, traveller....\n\n'The Corsairs have seized the road through Tarlang's Crown and foul things are afoot. We shall need more than you or I alone if we are to drive them out.'

Harnion can be found off the side of the road leading through Tarlang's Crown, to the north of Edhellond.\n\nElaglar has asked you to seek Harnion in Tarlang's Crown and investigate the Corsair forces massing there.
